justification: Misreads Team B’s mindset: B embraces volatility and contrarian upside, yet rationale frames them as seeking stability. Fails to leverage B’s preference for deep-threat WRs explicitly or acknowledge B’s RB depth needs—trading away their Tier 1 RB leaves RBs thin. Offer is somewhat coherent (WR1 + injured stash for RB1) but light for B. Explanation is generic and not grounded in roster context or B’s stated values.
